name: Shuffled Up
description:
Shuffled Up is a puzzle platformer game in which you are suffering from a desease called Dementia (loss of memory due to depression) and after a few seconds, your player forgets the controls of your game - He starts jumping on pressing right, and moving right on pressing left. This is just a DEMO with a single level but if you like the concept and gameplay, pls write in the comments below and I willl further move on the project. Thanks For Playing. All Kinds Of Suggestions Are Appreciated :-)

CONTROLS

Up/Right/Left Arrows will perform some random activity !!!
